name: Prospective Commercial NVC HVAC (FS)

market_entry_year_source.notes: Program target year for the technology performance level indicated by this ECM, updated to current year to avoid retroactive savings effects.

source_data.title: Building Technologies Office Multi-Year Program Plan

energy_efficiency_source.notes: Convert from primary COP of 2.28 (from Table 3 in BTO MYPP) to COP, multiply by 3.01; heating COP approximated as half of the cooling COP

source_data.title: Building Technologies Office Multi-Year Program Plan

installed_cost_source.notes: $20.3/kBtu/h cost premium (Table 3 in BTO report) + $113.9/kBtu/h ($10250/unit total installed cost / 90 kBtu/h capacity where cost and typical capacity are for the 2020 'typical' commercial rooftop AC unit in the EIA data)

source_data.title: Building Technologies Office Multi-Year Program Plan
Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies

product_lifetime_source.notes: Average lifetime for 2020 'typical' column for commercial rooftop AC

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies

market_scaling_fractions_source.heating: Applies to all commercial buildings with non-electric heating; commercial buildings with electric heating are excluded

cooling.title: 2012 CBECs microdata
cooling.fraction_derivation: Cooling multiple of 79.8% was determined as a proportion of commercial building square footage with cooling energy where heating is done using non-electric fuel from CBECS 2012 microdata. Total commercial square footage with cooling energy in the sample was 831 million ft^2; of those buildings, natural gas heating is used in 664 million ft^2.

_description: Commercial non-vapor compression HVAC system, assumed to have both heating and cooling capabilities, though operation might not be directly comparable to a 'heat pump'; cost and performance targets from BTO Multi-year Program Plan are not building type-specific
